headline: Dover Adds Cryogenic Pumps to Its Pumps & Process Solutions Segment
summary: DOWNERS GROVE, Ill., Jan. 20, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Dover today announced that it has acquired Cryogenic Machinery Corp. . The acquisition will become part of the PSG business within Dover's Pumps &...
